besNEWARRAY(X,Y)

[<<<] [>>>]

Create a new array and return the pointer to it. The arguments define the array low index and the array high index. This macro calls the function memory_NewArray().

See also

  • besNEWSTRING
  • besNEWLONG
  • besNEWREF
  • besNEWDOUBLE
  • besNEWARRAY @end itemize
    [<<<] [>>>]
